name: Green Eyre's End
description:
Green Eyre's End is a town mostly isolated from the world. There, strange events tend to occur. Unique fauna blooms, people are born with animal heads, and purple gems can allow people to cast magic.

There, in the year 2017, a man is murdered. In the halls of the afterlife, he wakes up with no memories. The manager offers him a temporary residence, but to be fully accepted in the other world, he must regain his identity.

He must now travel back to the town as a ghost, and discover who he was. And this town has much to reveal!
